prompt: Close-up, photorealistic shot focusing on an antique appraiser's hands wearing white cotton gloves, meticulously examining an intricate 18th-century silver pocket watch with a jeweler's loupe. The watch and hands are sharply in focus, positioned slightly off-center to the right against a softly blurred background suggesting an antique-filled study (bokeh effect). Warm, focused task lighting illuminates the details of the watch mechanism and the texture of the gloves. Professional photography style, shallow depth of field. --ar 16:9
name: antiques-appraisers-image-1.png

prompt: Wide-angle, photorealistic view of a seasoned antique appraiser's cluttered but organized mahogany desk. The desk fills the lower two-thirds of the 16:9 frame, laden with appraisal tools (loupes, reference books stacked horizontally, measuring tape, laptop open to a database), alongside several diverse antiques awaiting assessment (a ceramic vase, a small bronze statue, antique letters). Natural daylight streams from a window on the left, casting soft shadows, complemented by the warm glow of a classic green banker's lamp on the right. Scholarly, atmospheric, detailed environment. --ar 16:9
name: antiques-appraisers-image-2.png

prompt: Medium shot, photorealistic scene depicting a professional antique appraiser (middle-aged, knowledgeable demeanor) sitting across a polished wooden table from a client (looking attentive). The appraiser is gesturing towards an antique porcelain doll resting on a velvet cloth between them, explaining its provenance. The composition places the appraiser on the left, client on the right, with the doll as the central focus point. Soft, even indoor lighting illuminates the interaction within a tastefully decorated, professional appraisal office. Focus on human interaction and expertise. --ar 16:9
name: antiques-appraisers-image-3.png

prompt: Over-the-shoulder, photorealistic shot focusing on a laptop screen displaying a high-resolution image gallery of an antique Japanese screen, alongside digital appraisal notes and valuation data. The user's hands are visible resting on the keyboard. The person's shoulder and side of head frame the left edge of the shot. The background is a clean, modern home office, slightly out of focus. The screen's glow provides subtle illumination. Represents the modern, digital aspect of antique appraisal services. --ar 16:9
name: antiques-appraisers-image-4.png

prompt: Expansive, photorealistic wide shot within a well-lit gallery space or elegant room, showcasing an antique appraiser carefully inspecting a large, ornate 19th-century grandfather clock. The tall clock dominates the right side of the 16:9 frame, emphasizing its scale. The appraiser, positioned to the left, is kneeling slightly to examine the base with a small flashlight, its beam highlighting wood grain details. Bright, diffused gallery lighting ensures clarity. Professional, detailed assessment of a large-scale antique. --ar 16:9
name: antiques-appraisers-image-5.png
